Notes

Some Vim rc file notes I want to keep handy

Since this is a note place, I'll keep updating it.

There are a lot of useful rc files out there. A couple that I like some parts of are:

  • The Ultimage Vimrc. Many good things in here. Is it too much?
  • Steve Losh's. Tries to send your copies to his webpage. Messes with default copy behaviour. Nice, but does some fishy or annoying things. Does a lot of things.

They each have their drawbacks. There are also many nice color schemes. I'll keep a couple listed here.

  • darkblue
  • badwolf. Again, by Steve Losh.

Some other commands that I like to make sure are in my rc file:

" I like me cursor to move freely always
set virtualedit=all

" I use two spaces for indenting my python
" This gets undone sometimes, I'd like to find the culprit
" and make it stop.
set ts=2 
set sw=2

" Keep the cursor closer to the middle
set so=7

" line numbering
set nu
